message.content:
{"id": "4971", "title": "Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'", 
"description": "Bug 4971: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui jdt.ui3, the behavior appears to be strange. Selecting 'xxx' as the destination results in unexpected behavior.", 
"OB": "1. Open the jdt.ui3 project
2. Navigate to the package viewer
3. Select a package in project A
4. Right-click on the selected package
5. Choose 'Copy' from the context menu", 
"EB": "The package should be successfully copied to the specified destination (xxx)", 
"SR": "1. Create a new project (xxx2)
2. Open the package viewer
3. Select a package in project A
4. Right-click on the selected package
5. From the context menu, choose 'Copy'" 
}
